snippet: Britain's Andy Murray won a gripping five-set match against Japan's Kei Nishikori to secure a 3-1 Davis Cup win for the champions and a quarter-final with Novak Djokovic's Serbia....
lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Murray won a gripping five-set match against Japan's Kei Nishikori to secure a 3-1 Davis Cup win for the champions and a quarter-final with Novak Djokovic's Serbia.

headline.print_headline: More Murray Heroics as Britain Beat Japan
headline.main: More Murray Heroics as Britain Beat Japan
